response.original_title: Fred Astaire Salutes the Fox Musicals
response.overview: Fred Astaire hosts this compilation film of highlights from some of 20th Century Fox's best musicals. Among the performers included are Barbra Streisand, Carmen Miranda, Maurice Chevalier, Frank Sinatra and the Ritz Brothers, as well as Astaire himself. Although some of the titles here may not be quite as famous as those released by other studios, there are still lively song and dance numbers from such films as "On the Avenue," "Folies Bergere" and "Daddy Long Legs."
response.title: Fred Astaire Salutes the Fox Musicals
